name: Rejuvenation Potion Vendor
description: Makes Full Rejuvenation Potions available at vendors'
author: erSch

config.name: Sell price small portion
config.description: The price at which the small potion is sold by sellers

config.name: Sell price full portion
config.description: The price at which the full portion is sold by sellers

config.name: Full potion only in hell
config.description: If checked, only small rejuvenation potions are available in Normal and Nightmare and full potions in Hell.

config.name: All vendors sell rejuvenation potions
config.description: If checked, all vendors sell rejuvenation potions. Otherwise, only the vendors who sell healing potions.

config.name: Add cube recipe Full Healing Potion to Full Rejuvenation Potion
config.description: If checked, a cube recipe to convert a Full Healing Potion to a Full Rejuvenation Potion will be added.
